dontStandardize

public boolean dontStandardize(java.lang.String properName)
Check if we should not standardize a name.

Specified by:
dontStandardize in interface NameStandardizer
Parameters:
properName - Name to check.
Returns:
True to avoid standardizing name.

Names that contain periods are not standardized by default.

preprocessProperName

public java.lang.String preprocessProperName(java.lang.String properName)
Preprocess proper name.

Specified by:
preprocessProperName in interface NameStandardizer
Parameters:
properName - Proper name to preprocess.
Returns:
Preprocessed proper name.

By default, no preprocessing is applied; the original proper name is returned unchanged.
